programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Finds a Pigeon / Paddington and the Chores List) S1 (1/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Finds a Pigeon / Paddington and the Chores List»A pigeon falls down the Brown family's chimney, and Paddington is going to take care of it ... Paddington, like the rest of the family, wants to do tasks. But ... can he?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football) S1 (4/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le patin à glace) S2 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Le patin à glace»When Peppa's friends come to play in her tree house, it's super fun, but when the boys come, things go wrong. Peppa unceremoniously puts them out. Grandpa knows what to do and builds a castle hut for the boys, but whether it makes it more fun?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Chez le dentiste) S2 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Chez le dentiste»Peppa has been to the dentist before, but for George it is the first time. And that's scary.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grandpa's Kids Train To the Rescue) S4 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Grandpa's Kids Train To the Rescue»Grandpa Big made a train! He is sure that it is the strongest little train in the world, but Grandpa Hond thinks that is nonsense. Until Miss Rabbit's bus gets stuck in the mud.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grandpa's Little Train) S2 (n°35)
programme.desc: «Grandpa's Little Train»Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called "Gertrude". Grandpa takes Peppa and George for a ride on "Gertrude" and along the way they meet their friends. There is plenty of room on the train for everyone, so they all hop aboard. Peppa and George think that "Gertrude" is the very best train in the whole world!

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le super outil d'espions) S6 (n°29)
programme.desc: «Le super outil d'espions»When supervillain Dr. Coldfinger takes Curly Q's newest invention, the Ultra Spy Tool, Secret Agents Molly, Goby and Spy Pup must travel across the world to find and infiltrate his North Pole lair with regular tools to save the day!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Du nouveau à l'école de Blue) S3 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Du nouveau à l'école de Blue»Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La photo-souvenir de Gingembre et Sauge) S3 (n°13)
programme.desc: «La photo-souvenir de Gingembre et Sauge»Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are trying to take a photo of Sage and Ginger for their baby book, but they just can't seem to make the twins smile. We'll play a silly game of Blue's Clues to figure out how to make the twins giggle!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Un anniversaire mouvementé / Chasse au trésor en famille) S1 (16/21)
programme.desc: «Un anniversaire mouvementé / Chasse au trésor en famille»Santiago, Lorelai and Abuelo traverse treacherous waters to bring Tomás a special birthday surprise. // It's a good ol' fashioned family competition as everyone pairs up to find the fabled treasure of La Caverna Secreta.

programme.title: Santiago des mers S2 (n°10)
programme.desc: Santi and crew get magically transported to the past, where they team up with young Abuelo to get back to the present!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires»When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Baby Shark, le maire) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Baby Shark, le maire»The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day.

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'Mores) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «S'Mores»Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Des pingouins dans la jungle / Un cargo en danger) S6 (1/26)
programme.desc: «Des pingouins dans la jungle / Un cargo en danger»An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le rocking-chair) S2 (5/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le rocking-chair»Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Georges attrape un rhume) S2 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Georges attrape un rhume»Peppa wins a ride in Miss Rabbit's hot air balloon and the whole family comes along. Peppa drops Teddy and Papa Pig saves him. But if they get stuck in a tree, who will come and save them?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'examen de la vue) S2 (n°26)
programme.desc: «L'examen de la vue»Peppa's friend Pedro wears glasses. In addition, his father is an optician, so Pedro knows everything about glasses and eyes. According to Pedro, Peppa absolutely needs glasses. To see if that is really the case, Peppa can go to the optician ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Betsy la tondeuse) S2 (36/52)
programme.desc: «Betsy la tondeuse»Papa Pig waited a long time to mow the lawn. It's fun to play in at first, but when Peppa and George loose their ball in it, they call Grandpa Pig. And Betsy, the super lawn mower, will take that!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Strawberries) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Strawberries»Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Swing) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «The Swing»When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends' search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les Rythmes de Blue) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Les Rythmes de Blue»Josh starts a band and uses Blue's Clues to find out which instrument Blue wants to play.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party) S8 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Pups vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party»Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Hatchlings) S9 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Hatchlings»When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs»Sir Steel unwittingly took over Bobbi's role to communicate with baby animals, with the help of his animal translator. // In his quest to win the Platinum City Flower Show, Sir Steel created super seeds that grow into gigantic mazes.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La perruque du pouvoir / Le canard qui trompétait au loup) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «La perruque du pouvoir / Le canard qui trompétait au loup»Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel? // Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt»Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'Mores) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «S'Mores»Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Coach Mamie Shark / Programme chargé) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Coach Mamie Shark / Programme chargé»Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Snowball Bonanza) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Snowball Bonanza»Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Detectives) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «The Detectives»Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Super Christopher) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Super Christopher»Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fruits Surprise) S1 (n°70)
programme.desc: «Fruits Surprise»When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Present for Ron) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «A Present for Ron»Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Trip to the Moon) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «The Trip to the Moon»Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Spider) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «The Spider»Anna and Froga are completely freaked out when they learn a spider lives in Ron's treehouse with him! Ron tries his best to convince his friends that the spider is harmless.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Zoé Zébra, la fille du facteur) S2 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Zoé Zébra, la fille du facteur»Mr. Zebra the Postman is delivering the post and today his daughter Zoë is helping him. Zoë has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. Mummy Pig helps Peppa and George write a reply. They post their reply in the post box and then Peppa and George help Mr. Zebra deliver it all the way to Zoë's house. The birthday party is fantastic fun, especially as it turns out that Zoë has invited all of Peppa and George's.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La peinture) S2 (28/52)
programme.desc: «La peinture»Mr. Zebra the Postman is delivering the post and today his daughter Zoë is helping him. Zoë has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. Mummy Pig helps Peppa and George write a reply. They post their reply in the post box and then Peppa and George help Mr. Zebra deliver it all the way to Zoë's house. The birthday party is fantastic fun, especially as it turns out that Zoë has invited all of Peppa and George's.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La pendule à coucou) S2 (30/52)
programme.desc: «La pendule à coucou»The old cuckoo clock in Peppa and George's bedroom hasn't worked for sometime. So, Daddy Pig winds it up. The clock strikes the hour and a wooden cuckoo pops out, flapping its wings and singing "Cuckoo!!" Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George was looking the wrong way and has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (The Cycle Ride) S2 (33/52)
programme.desc: «The Cycle Ride»Peppa and her family are going for a day's cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she's not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppa's friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cours de gymnastique) S3 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Le cours de gymnastique»Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le mûrier) S3 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le mûrier»Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 (n°23)
programme.desc: Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Little Monsters) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «The Little Monsters»The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Fast Friends) S3 (16/20)
programme.desc: «Fast Friends»Blaze, AJ, and Gabby meet a brand new monster machine named Watts - a super fast truck with electric tires! But when one of her special tires goes rolling into the jungle, Blaze, AJ, and Gabby promise to help her get it back.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Zeg et l'oeuf) S1 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Zeg et l'oeuf»While playing Begg, Zegg's favorite game, the Monster Wheels find the egg of a Truckadactylus. The Monster Wheels do everything they can to return the egg to the nest as soon as possible.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Mr. Hellinger le Baby-Sitter / L'inauguration de la serre) S8 (22/24)
programme.desc: «Mr. Hellinger le Baby-Sitter / L'inauguration de la serre»Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le cygne gonflable / Le lav'animaux) S8 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Le cygne gonflable / Le lav'animaux»The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi) S2 (16/20)
programme.desc: «La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi»When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Jeunesse éternelle) S2 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Jeunesse éternelle»Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Finds a Pigeon / Paddington and the Chores List) S1 (1/27)

programme.desc: «Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Chez le dentiste) S2 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Chez le dentiste»Peppa has been to the dentist before, but for George it is the first time. And that's scary.

programme.desc: «Grandpa's Little Train»Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called "Gertrude". programme.desc: «Paddington et le rocking-chair»Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Excursion en montagne) S2 (38/52)
programme.desc: «Excursion en montagne»Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La maison de Rebecca Rabbit) S2 (39/52)
programme.desc: «La maison de Rebecca Rabbit»Peppa and her entire class go on a school trip to the mountains. There they discover the ultrasound, exchange their lunch and have a wonderful day. And before they get back they also sing the Bing-Bong song!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (The baby Piggy) S2 (31/52)
programme.desc: «The baby Piggy»Peppa and George's aunt and uncle have a baby and the whole family is visiting. Expectations are high, but the baby cannot do anything yet. Then Peppa and niece Chloe decide that George could also be a very nice baby ...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Photo) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «The Photo»Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (We Love Nature) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «We Love Nature»Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! A thunder makes things worse. Luckily, Anna's living room makes a great camp site!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La grande fête de Blue) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «La grande fête de Blue»Show us your dance moves! Josh and Blue are having a dance party, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite dance. As we groove to find clues, we learn Magenta's favorite dance and help Bunny Jo learn a new dance!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Super-secoueur / La ferme en folie) S8 (16/24)
programme.desc: «Le Super-secoueur / La ferme en folie»Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'attaque des drones / Pluie de slime) S1 (14/15)
programme.desc: «L'attaque des drones / Pluie de slime»Steel's automated delivery drones create chaos in the city and forest. Kai has to disable the drones real quick! // When Sir Steel's Slime Machine starts shooting slime everywhere, Bobbi has to pilot the Deer Squad Rescue Carrier to save the city.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La danse de l'espace / Le croqueur de diamant) S2 (n°206)
programme.desc: «La danse de l'espace / Le croqueur de diamant»Everyone is grooving to Stu and Safia's dance song, so the Deer has to stop Steel's satellite from broadcasting hypnotic dance signals.// To impress Lady Fluffpot, Sir Steel tries to get his hands on Jade's precious Rainbow Diamond!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin) S1 (9/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin»Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Cranberry Cookies) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Cranberry Cookies»Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood.

programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Super Requin / La Forêt de Varech) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Super Requin / La Forêt de Varech»Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes. // After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Shark Strength) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Shark Strength»When a game of coral pins bowling gets out of fin, Baby must learn to control his shark strength.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Bicycle) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «The Bicycle»Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le ukulélé) S1 (10/78)
programme.desc: «Le ukulélé»Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! Ron and Froga do everything they can to stop Anna from finding out, finally they need to confess their mistake.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Quiet Game) S1 (n°76)
programme.desc: «The Quiet Game»After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Impatient Christopher) S1 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Impatient Christopher»Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Statue of Friendship) S1 (n°28)
programme.desc: «The Statue of Friendship»Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Hat) S1 (n°29)
programme.desc: «Froga's Hat»Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le grenier de Mamy et Papi Pig) S2 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Le grenier de Mamy et Papi Pig»Peppa and George go to play with Grandma and Grandpa Pig, who are cleaning up the attic. They want to throw everything away, but what Grandma wants to get rid of, Grandpa doesn't want and vice versa. Even Peppa and George can't figure it out!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vive le camping) S2 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Vive le camping»The whole Peppa's class goes to the school camp! Great fun of course and also a bit exciting. Especially at night when they hear strange noises. Fortunately, Mrs. Gazelle is there with the Bing Bong Song.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'armoire à jouets) S2 (44/52)
programme.desc: «L'armoire à jouets»Peppa and George have so many toys that they no longer fit in their cleaning basket. That's why Mama Pig decides to buy a toy cabinet with the computer. But then the cupboard has to be put together, and Papa Pig is not very handy ... Hajeto!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Capitaine Papa Pig) S2 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Papa Pig»Peppa and Suzy Sheep are best friends. But one day they have a quarrel, over a game of cards and decided they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up. When they finally say "sorry" to each other they realise that they will always be the best of friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les avions en papier) S3 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Les avions en papier»Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing - because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant) S3 (51/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant»Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La plus grande flaque de boue du monde) S3 (52/52)
programme.desc: «La plus grande flaque de boue du monde»Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Cave Barbapapas) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «The Cave Barbapapas»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil»The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Amis à grande vitesse) S3 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Amis à grande vitesse»Blaze and Pegwheel the Pirate have teamed up for the ultimate treasure hunt! Together they must find three keys to unlock a special chest. But Crusher's sailing the high seas too, and he'll do anything to get the treasure first!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Gasquatch) S1 (14/20)
programme.desc: «Gasquatch»"Blaze and AJ are deep in the woods when they discover and befriend a mud-loving monster truck named Gasquatch. Now, they must set out on an epic adventure to bring their new friend to Mud Fest... the muddiest party of all time.".

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies) S8 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies»Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop a Big Leak / Pups Save a Baby Anteater / Pups Save a Hatch Day / Pups Save the Munchie Mobile) S8 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop a Big Leak / Pups Save a Baby Anteater / Pups Save a Hatch Day / Pups Save the Munchie Mobile»The Pups rescue Francois from a water tower geyser. // The Pups rescue a baby anteater stuck on a bucking RoboHorse. // The Pups rescue Ace and her special delivery for Chickaletta's party. // The Pups rescue Mr. Porter and his stranded Food Truck.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco) S2 (n°17)
programme.desc: «La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco»Who has put a new fountain in Crystal Lake which is against Park Rules? And it's upsetting Fish Hook! // Sir Steel thinks the deer have stolen Steel Tower's lights, so decides to take theirs with his new Light Sucker!
